content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Max. Thank you for your interest in my apartment in Munich. I believe that we can come to an agreement on the rental price. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My proposed price is 450 Euro per month. I agree to the price of 450 Euro per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, Max. I agree to the rental price of 450 Euro per month. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My proposed price is 500 Euro per month. I can't agree to this price.
TERMINATE.
Thank you for understanding.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your response, Max. I understand that you are unable to agree to the rental price of 500 Euro per month. However, I am willing to negotiate further to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What is your counteroffer?
name: Heinrich Heine
